name: Sketchy Cleanup Detail
description:
Short puzzle about cleaning contaminated surfaces.

Made with Puzzlescript. Submission to the #week-sauce jam.

Controls:

  • WASD | arrows | {Swipe} - move up/down/left/right
  • X | [SPACE] | {Tap} - Pour water from the bucket
  • Z - Undo
  • R - Reload level
  • Undo and Reload on mobile are available through menu (top-left corner).
